    • Method Detail

      • downloadUpdate

        public void downloadUpdate(String url)
                    throws Exception
        Downloads the new file from internet To apply the changes you should restart the server
        Parameters:
        url - Direct url to the file
        Throws:
        Exception - if there is an exception (See Utils.downloadFile(String, File))

      • restartServer

        public void restartServer(boolean script)
        This restarts the server (Dont use automatically, use with user agreement)
        Parameters:
        script - If is true the API will stop the server and start the bash script specified in the server configurations otherwise the API will execute the command "restart" through console

      • restartServer

        public void restartServer()
        See restartServer(boolean) (By default is used the value script as false)
